results.content: Super Course! Some Things are not working properly anymore. But with a little effort you can figure it out!

results.content: Tons of great knowledge on how to build a store/shopping cart.  Unfortunately, there are several long pauses without any accompanying audio that left me wondering if the video had inadvertently stopped playing.
results.content_html: Tons of great knowledge on how to build a store/shopping cart. Unfortunately, there are several long pauses without any accompanying audio that left me wondering if the video had inadvertently stopped playing.

results.content: This course moves quickly but the code is slowly becoming self explanitory. I can take this code as a base for my own projects, AND I understand it, which I really really appreciate.
results.content_html: This course moves quickly but the code is slowly becoming self explanitory. I can take this code as a base for my own projects, AND I understand it, which I really really appreciate.

results.content: Excelente curso, muy directo, desarrollando una aplicación web de mucha funcionalidad. Muchas gracias M. Hendra!
results.content_html: Excelente curso, muy directo, desarrollando una aplicación web de mucha funcionalidad. Muchas gracias M. Hendra!

results.content:
This course is the best Udemy course I've taken on Nuxt.js. It is up-to-date(as of 1/20/19) and so extremely thorough that I have been launched into a confident position to build what I need for my company. 

It covered things that other courses didn't like DOM manipulation with the returned data, modules, localStorage for items not persisted to a Database and many more.

The instructor is very knowledgeable and responsive.

What would've made this course even better, is if it had a screencast for deployment to a production server on the web and fixes for a few minor bugs.

This is your course for learning Nuxt! Take it now!

Thanks M. Hendra for your contribution!
results.content_html:

Thanks M. Hendra for your contribution!

results.content:
This is a good course for understanding how firebase works on Nuxt.
But one thing I need to point out, the authentication section seems unsecure because any user can literally make themselves an admin. I would suggest learning Firestore and Cloud Functions to make the application secure. Overall this was a good course, this is highly recommended if you want to learn how to integrating firebase and Nuxt.
results.content_html:

results.content: Was great but somethings didn't work, linter stuff for example. Could type and talk a bit faster and clearer. Could provide to all lectures the updated files, with the new code. A typed transcript would be nice too, the autogenerated is not of good quality.

results.content: Looking forward to the next lecture

The course content is well thought out and a great coding time saver.  Some of it is dated now.  As an example, Bulma is an option of the Nuxt install and there is a Nuxt version of vee-validate.  About halfway through.

results.content: Perfect match for me! So far it's been Great. Other courses are either too basic, or advanced and specific. This is hitting the sweet spot ito pacing and relevance. However, the CLI didn't produce exact same project structure with no eslint rc file. I think the CLI has been updated.
